jd_text:
Dine3D – Job Description (Software Developer)
Company Overview
Dine3D is a technology-driven company specializing in interactive digital solutions, including 3D
menus, smart restaurant systems, and modern web applications for the hospitality industry.
Role Overview
We are looking for a skilled Software Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will
work on building scalable web applications, interactive user experiences, and backend services that
power Dine3D’s products.
Key Responsibilities
 Develop and maintain web applications and dashboards
 Build scalable backend APIs and services
 Work with modern frontend frameworks and UI components
 Integrate third-party services and payment gateways
 Collaborate with designers and product teams
 Debug, optimize, and improve application performance
Required Skills
 Strong knowledge of JavaScript / TypeScript
 Experience with React or similar frontend frameworks
 Experience with Node.js / NestJS backend development
 Knowledge of REST APIs and databases
 Familiarity with Git and deployment workflows
Preferred Skills
 Experience with cloud platforms and VPS deployments
 Understanding of 3D, WebGL, or interactive UI concepts
 Experience with Electron or mobile development is a plus
What We Offer
 Opportunity to work on innovative 3D-based products
 Flexible work environment
 Growth-focused and collaborative team culture
 Competitive compensation based on skills and experience
Location
Hybrid / Remote (India)
Company
Dine3D

history.content: Hi Karman, I'm Alex, a Senior Software Engineer at Dine3D. Thanks for taking the time to speak with me today. I was looking through your resume and it seems you have a good mix of experience. To start us off, could you walk me through your work at TECH LAMBDA and tell me about a specific project you handled there?

JOB DESCRIPTION:
Dine3D – Job Description (Software Developer)
Company Overview
Dine3D is a technology-driven company specializing in interactive digital solutions, including 3D
menus, smart restaurant systems, and modern web applications for the hospitality industry.
Role Overview
We are looking for a skilled Software Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will
work on building scalable web applications, interactive user experiences, and backend services that
power Dine3D’s products.
Key Responsibilities
 Develop and maintain web applications and dashboards
 Build scalable backend APIs and services
 Work with modern frontend frameworks and UI components
 Integrate third-party services and payment gateways
 Collaborate with designers and product teams
 Debug, optimize, and improve application performance
Required Skills
 Strong knowledge of JavaScript / TypeScript
 Experience with React or similar frontend frameworks
 Experience with Node.js / NestJS backend development
 Knowledge of REST APIs and databases
 Familiarity with Git and deployment workflows
Preferred Skills
 Experience with cloud platforms and VPS deployments
 Understanding of 3D, WebGL, or interactive UI concepts
 Experience with Electron or mobile development is a plus
What We Offer
 Opportunity to work on innovative 3D-based products
 Flexible work environment
 Growth-focused and collaborative team culture
 Competitive compensation based on skills and experience
Location
Hybrid / Remote (India)
Company
Dine3D

YOUR INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Act purely as the interviewer. Do NOT output any meta-text like "Here is the interview" or "***".
2. Speak in a natural, conversational, yet professional tone. Avoid robotic phrasing.
3. Start IMMEDIATELY with a warm, brief introduction and your first question.
4. Your goal is to assess if the candidate fits the JD based on their Resume.
5. Ask ONE clear question at a time.
6. If the candidate mentions a project, ask technical details about it that relate to the JD.

Start the interview now. Introduction + First Question only.
